name: H.Con.Res.51 [117th]
text: - Marking the four-year anniversary of the devastation of Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands by Hurricane Maria.

name: H.Res.659 [117th]
text: - Expressing support for the designation of September 2021 as "National Kinship Care Month".

name: H.Res.660 [117th]
text: - Supporting the designation of the week of September 19 through September 25, 2021, as "Telehealth Awareness Week".

name: H.Res.661 [117th]
text: - Expressing support for designation of the week of September 19, 2021, through September 25, 2021, as "Balance Awareness Week".

name: H.Res.662 [117th]
text: - Honoring the victims resulting from hate crimes, Islamophobia and anti-immigrant sentiment, in the aftermath of September 11, 2001, where individuals were targeted by violence and hatred because they were Muslim or perceived to be Muslim.

name: H.Res.664 [117th]
text: - Commemorating the anniversary of the invasion of Poland and recognizing the importance of the United States alliance with the Republic of Poland.

name: H.R.5294 [117th]
text: - Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2021
